nars.util.utf8

Class Utf8

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.util.utf8.Utf8
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.CharSequence, java.lang.Comparable<Utf8>, Byted

    public class Utf8
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.CharSequence, java.lang.Comparable<Utf8>, Byted
    http://www.ascii-code.com/ we can use the 0..31 control characters for 1 byte representation of NAL operators which will be interpreted as such when not between double quotes
    Author:
    https://github.com/squito/jutf8 http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/avro/trunk/lang/java/avro/src/main/java/org/apache/avro/other/Utf8.java?revision=1552418&view=co
